name: Fitness Management Notion Template
description: If you are struggling to organise and manage your fitness plan, then this Notion template is for you!Key Features:1) Weight Progress Tracking - Keep track of your weight, BMI, Body Fat Percentage as well as other body measurements as you require using this template!2) Progress Gallery - Keep track of your physique as you embark on your fitness journey!3) Recipe Book - Finding it hard to remember all the healthy recipes you see online? Save all of them in here for your convenience!4) Workout Coll
